tagline: Opens doors through deeply researched outreach that feels like a warm introduction
pros: Personalized outreach that dramatically outperforms generic blasts
Rigorous qualification that keeps the pipeline honest
Competitive intelligence gathered directly from prospect conversations
cons: Outbound takes time to ramp — results aren't instant
Effectiveness depends on a well-defined ICP
Can't close deals — needs strong handoff to sales

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
